pages.title: Ares Blessing
pages.text: $(li)Max Level = 3 $(li)Treasure = True $(li)Tradeable = False $(li)Rarity = Very Rare $()$(br)Values can be different from pack to pack

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Lethal damage will be converted into durability loss. $(br)Exceptions are magic & fall damage

pages.title: Transcended
pages.text: Required Level = 200 $(br2)Fall Damage no longer bypasses this
